Reviews.Author: John  Aylett
Reviews.Content: More than what I expected!!I had the first generation I Pad, served all my needs, till I Pad Air, it's amazing!
Reviews.Title: AMAZING

Reviews.Author: Henry B Martin Jr
Reviews.Content: Unit arrived on time and as advertised.  No problems with FYA Electronics.IPAD Air brand new with all accessories.  Will do business with them again
Reviews.Title: As advertised

Reviews.Author: raman maan
Reviews.Content: this was gift for my wife. she love it. five stars. she is very happy with her ipad air. :)
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: Larry Cadiere "Mr. Darcy"
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased this for  my son for Christmas and ended up keeping for myself. I had the Ipad 3rd Generation and loved that one. This one is lighter, smaller but just as good. I love the Ipad products, and not really to keen for android tablets. It was no problem with transferring my info onto this tablet at all. Apple has a really great product and I am very satisfied. Purchased many Apple products this Christmas.
Reviews.Title: IPAD...THE ABSOLUTE BEST

Reviews.Author: pbjb
Reviews.Content: I had the first Ipad but this one has a much sharper image and easy to go from one app or screen to another.
Reviews.Title: Love it.
